hero.bioText: Hi! I'm a Full Stack Software Engineer. My main tech stack is React.js + Node.js + TypeScript. I have +5 years of experience. I love solving problems and satisfying needs through software development.

moreAbout.title: More About Me
moreAbout.p1: I have experience working with Golang, Microservices.
moreAbout.p2: I also have experience building CI/CD Pipelines and I love them!
moreAbout.p3: I work on MacOS because I prefer zsh over Powershell.

project1.title: Recontent
project1.details: Led to build this project from a template and helped to launch the MVP.

project2.title: Badgr Extras
project2.details: Helped to maintain this Chrome extension and solved a few critical bugs.

project3.title: Resolutions App
project3.details: A web app that allows you to remember significant events ion your life.
